notes: [Fixed] Fixed issue with `{siteUrl}` being an array not a string. Thanks to [@slelorrain](https://github.com/slelorrain).
[Added] Added `{siteUrl}` twig tag when creating nav items.
[Fixed] Fixed issue with url's not being properly sanitised and processed.
[Fixed] Fixed issue with plugin release feed url.
[Added] Craft 2.5 support, including release feed and icons.
[Added] Added Layouts - set different navigations and assign to user groups. Great for creating client-specific navigation, without changing navigation for other users.
[Improved] Completely re-written from the ground up for better performance and tidiness.
Removed Quick-Add menu for the moment.
